name: Twelve Data
label: Twelve Data

auth.notes: Append ?apikey=YOUR_API_KEY to every Twelve Data request (keep keys server-side).

per_day.notes: Free basic plan: ~800 API credits per day:contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}.

per_month.notes: No fixed monthly cap; daily and per-minute limits govern usage.

per_minute.notes: Free plan: 8 API credits per minute (each request costs credits).

per_second.notes: No explicit per-second limit; constrained by per-minute quota.

reset_window.notes: Credits reset every day at midnight (provider’s server time).

credits_model.notes: Each endpoint has a credit weight; simple quotes cost 1 credit each.

notes: Multi-asset provider historically used as primary, now mostly as backup source. Covers FX, crypto, equities and technical indicators with generous free-tier quotas.
